other_tests.findings: Severe genu valgum of the right knee with a hip-knee-ankle angle (HKAa) of valgus 29.0°, grade IV osteoarthritic changes in the lateral femorotibial compartment, and laterally dislocated patella.

changes_over_time.findings: HKAa of valgus 16° on the right and left knees.
HKAa of valgus 13° on the right and 17° on the left knees.
HKAa of valgus 11° on the right and 16° on the left knees.
HKAa of valgus 11° on the right and 17° on the left knees.

other_tests.findings: Tibial tuberosity to trochlear groove distance of 41.3 mm.

other_tests.procedure_name: Knee Society Knee score and Function score assessment
other_tests.findings: Preoperative knee score was 20/30, and functional score was 60/60 on the right and left knees, respectively; improved to 60/50 and 85/85 on the right and left knees, respectively, at 5 years.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved from 20/30 preoperatively to 60/50 postoperatively on the right knee and from 60/60 preoperatively to 85/85 on the left knee at the latest follow-up.

other_tests.findings: Manual muscle testing showed grade 3/4 on both knees, range of motion (ROM) was 20°-150°, patella was laterally dislocated during knee flexion.
